metadata.title: Charmian Women's Steampunk Victorian Gothic Lace Trim Ruffled High Low Skirt
features: Please check our size chart on the each color's left size pictures, instead of Amazon size chart; Choose the size based on your waist size.

Steampunk high low skirt, adopted high waist and ruched design, ankle length, both side of waistband is decorated by button accents, drawstring straps to adjust the length of skirt, two tiers skirt in order to add layering and prevent wardrobe malfunction, embellished with black sheer floral lace trim hemline, which will adorn bigger hips and make waist look smaller while also visually creating curves for slender lady.

High elastic material make you easily wear or take off, fit for more size bodies; Concealed zipper closure at side. The irregular skirt combined stylish with Victorian Gothic style, make people more elegant.

It is perfect to match with steampunk corset, peasant blouse top,also it is suitable for steampunk themed party, Halloween, pirate costume collocation, fashion show, cosplay show, masquerade, post apocalyptic theme outfit and so on. It is never out of time style and well match with other clothes.
Hand wash separately in cold water, do not use machine.
description: Charmian Steampunk Victorian Gothic Lace Trim Ruffled High Low Skirt

It adopted high waist and ruched design, ankle length, both side of waistband is decorated by button accents, drawstring straps to adjust the length of skirt, two tiers skirt, embellished with black sheer floral lace trim hemline.High elastic material make you easily wear or take off, fit for more size bodies, concealed zipper closure at side.It is perfect to match with steampunk corset, peasant blouse top, also it is suitable for steampunk themed party, Halloween, pirate costume collocation, fashion show, cosplay show, masquerade, post apocalyptic theme outfit and so on.
